channel.title: CVE Feed for SedLex -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SedLex -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-42460|2024-08-03T13:10:40.860Z -- sedlex -- traffic%20manager%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability leading to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Traffic Manager plugin <= 1.4.5 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-38079|2024-08-03T10:45:52.537Z -- sedlex -- backup%20scheduler%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability Backup Scheduler plugin <= 1.5.13 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-41619|2024-08-03T12:49:43.581Z -- sedlex -- image%20zoom
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SedLex Image Zoom.This issue affects Image Zoom: from n/a through 1.8.8.

item.title: CVE-2022-41695|2024-08-03T12:49:43.759Z -- sedlex -- traffic%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SedLex Traffic Manager.This issue affects Traffic Manager: from n/a through 1.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-40219|2024-08-03T12:14:39.952Z -- sedlex -- favicon%20switcher%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SedLex FavIcon Switcher plugin <= 1.2.11 at WordPress allows plugin settings change.
